casebody.data:
Stephen SILBERKRAUS; Chelyn Sawyer; David Satory; Claire Roth; Neil Roth ; and Kathryn McKenzie, Signatories of the Notice of Intent to Recall, Appellants,
v.
Joyce WOODHOUSE, in Her Capacity as Nevada State Senator for Senate District 5; Nicole J. Cannizzaro, in Her Capacity as Nevada State Senator for Senate District 6; Barbara Cegavske, in Her Official Capacity as Nevada Secretary of State; and Joseph P. Gloria, in His Official Capacity as Registrar of Voters for Clark County, Nevada, Respondents. No. 76040 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 19, 2019

AFFIRMED.
